author: Staff Reporter
text:
A driver and two passengers escaped without any injury after a private cab went up in flames on the Ponnamallee High Road near Central railway station on Monday evening.

Police said Jayaprakash, the driver of the cab, noticed smoke coming out of the engine and immediately stopped the car. He and the passengers got out in time before a fire broke out. They alerted the police.

A fire tender was pressed into service to douse the fire, the police said.
title: Car goes up in flames near Central station
